p: There were no treatment-emergent in-hospital SAE related to the transendocardial delivery of ATMP-CD133. In 3 out of 10 patients, mild to moderate (≤ 15 mm) pericardial effusions were recorded on 2D echocardiogram during the 24 h postoperative monitoring. These events were all spontaneously resolved before hospital discharge. During the 12-month arrhythmia follow-up, no patient presented episodes of sustained ventricular tachycardia or ventricular fibrillation as documented by ILR or ICD continuous monitoring.
